strike somebody/something ↔ off.translat: if a doctor, lawyer etc is struck off, their name is removed from the official list of people who are allowed to work as doctors, lawyers etc
to remove someone or something from a list
Terri was told to strike off the names of every person older than 30.
if a doctor, lawyer etc is struck off, their name is removed from the official list of people who are allowed to work as doctors, lawyers etc
